graph_title: Giovani che non lavorano e non studiano (classi 15–24 e 15-29)
indicator_definition: This proportion of youth (aged 15-24 years) not in education, employment or training, also known as "the NEET rate", conveys the number of young persons not in education, employment or training as a percentage of the total youth population.
indicator_name: Giovani che non lavorano e non studiano (classi 15–24 e 15-29)
target_name: By 2020, substantially reduce the proportion of youth not in employment, education or training
indicator_name_national: Giovani che non lavorano e non studiano (classi 15–24 e 15-29)
